mapper.select: select * from mu_tender t inner join mu_company_info ci on t.com_info_no = ci.com_info_no inner join mu_company_file cf on ci.com_info_no = cf.com_info_no where t.auction_no=#{auctionNo} and cf.com_file_repr = 'Y'
select count(*) from mu_tender t inner join mu_company_info ci on t.com_info_no = ci.com_info_no where t.auction_no=#{auctionNo}

select * from mu_company_info ci right join mu_company_file cf on ci.com_info_no = cf.com_info_no where ci.mem_no=#{memNo} and cf.com_file_repr = 'Y' and com_info_type in('v','s','d','m','h','j','e') order by field(com_info_type,'v','s','d','m','h','j','e')
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(com_info_no)+1 FROM mu_company_info
insert into mu_company_info(mem_no, com_info_content, com_info_profile, com_info_name, com_info_phone,com_info_addr, com_info_addr_detail, com_info_type) values(#{memNo}, #{comInfoContent}, #{comInfoProfile}, #{comInfoName}, #{comInfoPhone},#{comInfoAddr}, #{comInfoAddrDetail}, #{comInfoType})
mapper.update: update mu_company_info set com_info_content = #{comInfoContent}, com_info_profile = #{comInfoProfile}, com_info_name=#{comInfoName}, com_info_phone=#{comInfoPhone}, com_info_addr=#{comInfoAddr}, com_info_addr_detail=#{comInfoAddrDetail}, com_info_okay=#{comInfoOkay} where com_info_no=#{comInfoNo}
mapper.insert: insert into mu_company_file(com_info_no, com_file_name, com_file_oriname, com_file_path, com_file_repr) values(#{comInfoNo}, #{comFileName}, #{comFileOriname}, #{comFilePath}, #{comFileRepr})
mapper.select: select *, auction_edate-now() as dday from mu_member m inner join mu_auction a on a.mem_no = m.mem_no inner join mu_tender t on a.auction_no = t.auction_no and t.mem_no=#{memNo} limit #{begin}, 10
select count(*) as count from(select t.tender_no from mu_auction a, mu_tender t where a.auction_no = t.auction_no and t.mem_no=#{memNo}) a
select * from mu_member m, mu_general g where m.mem_no = g.gen_no and m.mem_no=#{memNo}
select * from mu_member m, mu_company c where m.mem_no = c.com_no and m.mem_no=#{memNo}

select * from mu_company_like l inner join mu_company_info ci on l.com_info_no = ci.com_info_no inner join mu_company_file cf on ci.com_info_no = cf.com_info_no inner join mu_code c on ci.com_info_type=c.code_name where l.mem_no=#{memNo} and cf.com_file_repr='Y'
select count(*) from mu_company_like l inner join mu_company_info ci on l.com_info_no = ci.com_info_no where l.mem_no=#{memNo};

select * from mu_auction a inner join mu_tender t on t.auction_no = a.auction_no inner join mu_company_info ci on t.com_info_no = ci.com_info_no where a.mem_no=#{memNo} and a.auction_status=#{auctionStatus}
select v.* from mu_venue v inner join mu_auction a on v.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select s.* from mu_studio s inner join mu_auction a on s.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select d.* from mu_dress d inner join mu_auction a on d.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select m.* from mu_makeup m inner join mu_auction a on m.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select m.* from mu_honeymoon m inner join mu_auction a on m.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select j.* from mu_jewelry j inner join mu_auction a on j.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
select sd.* from mu_service_add sd inner join mu_auction a on sd.auction_no=a.auction_no where a.auction_no=#{auctionNo}
mapper.update: update mu_vennu set wedding_venue=#{weddingVenue}, wedding_date=#{weddingDate}, wedding_time=#{weddingTime}, wedding_type=#{weddingType}, wedding_vistor=#{weddingVistor}, wedding_wish=#{weddingWish}, wedding_budget=#{weddingBudget} where auction_no=#{auctionNo}

update mu_studio set studio_place=#{studioPlace}, studio_outdoor=#{studioOutdoor}, studio_snapshot=#{studioSnapshot}, studio_video=#{studioVideo}, studio_pickup=#{studioPickup} where auction_no=#{auctionNo}
update mu_makeup set mku_makeup=#{mkuMakeup}, dress_neckline=#{mkuMom}, dress_type=#{mkuBudget}, dress_neckline=#{mkuWorkout}, dress_type=#{mkuMore} where auction_no=#{auctionNo}
mapper.insert: insert into mu_reservation(tender_no, res_visit, res_date, res_time, res_email, res_phone, res_message) values(#{tenderNo}, #{resVisit}, #{resDate}, #{resTime}, #{resEmail}, #{resPhone}, #{resMessage})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT t.todo_period common, c.code_value title from mu_todo t inner join mu_code c on c.code_name = t.todo_period where t.mem_no=#{memNo} and c.code_table='mu_todo' and c.code_column = 'todo_period'

select DISTINCT t.todo_category common, c.code_value title, t.mem_no memNo from mu_todo t inner join mu_code c on c.code_name = t.todo_category where t.mem_no=#{memNo} and c.code_table='mu_todo' and c.code_column = 'todo_category'
mapper.insert: insert into mu_todo(todo_title, todo_day, todo_category,todo_detail,mem_no, todo_check,todo_delete) values(#{todoTitle},#{todoDay}, #{todoCategory},#{todoDetail},#{memNo},'N','N')
mapper.select: select * from mu_budget b right join mu_code c on c.code_name=b.budg_category where code_table='mu_budget' and mem_no=#{memNo}
select count(*) from mu_todo where mem_no = #{memNo} and todo_check = 'y'
select count(*) from mu_auction where mem_no = #{memNo} and auction_status = 'done'
select ifnull(plan_wed_date,TO_DATE(TO_CHAR('2018-11-22', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) from mu_wedding_plan wp RIGHT OUTER JOIN mu_member m on m.mem_no = wp.mem_no where m.mem_no= #{memNo}
select ifnull(count(l.mem_no),0) count from mu_company_like l right outer join mu_member m on m.mem_no = l.mem_no where m.mem_no=#{memNo} group by l.mem_no
select ifnull(sum(budg_budget),0) budg_budget_sum from mu_budget b RIGHT OUTER JOIN mu_member m on m.mem_no = b.mem_no where m.mem_no = #{memNo} group by b.mem_no
select ifnull(sum(budg_expenses),0) budg_expenses from mu_budget b RIGHT OUTER JOIN mu_member m on m.mem_no = b.mem_no where m.mem_no =#{memNo} group by b.mem_no
select * from mu_todo where mem_no=#{memNo} and (todo_delete='N' or todo_delete='n') order by todo_no desc limit 3
